jobDescription: Title : Data Analyst Duration : 4 Month C2H  Location: Wilmington VA / McLean VA A Bachelor's Degree with a hard science concentration (i.e. Math, Statistics, Computer Science, or related) and at least 5+ year's experience)Development experience with Business Intelligence tools requiredExperienced Tableau Developer; Experience with additional Business Intelligence tools a plusExperience with the fundamental SQL and data modeling required (Python a plus)Solid understanding of MS SQL Server or other relational databases required Solid understand of Amazon AWS, PostgreSQL & other cloud computing technologiesSolid understanding of API usage and integrationUnderstanding the principles and application of ETL processes, data modeling, reporting process metadata; Alteryx experience a plusStrong analytical and problem-solving skills and ability to provide creative solutionsStrong communication skills with ability to communicate effectively with both business and technical personnelResponsible for the design, development and administration of transactional and analytical data constructs/structures.
